com.snap2d.world
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  com.snap2d.world.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public abstract class Entity
extends Object
implements Renderable

Represents an object in the 2-dimensional world space. Entity provides a base implementation for all objects that exist in the world. Not recommended for implementation yet. This class is a work in progress and subject to change.

Author:
Brian Groenke
